availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Susan Wallace. Resident of Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 40th Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from August 1863 to December 2, 1863. Served in the 40th Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as quartermaster sergeant from December 2, 1863 to July 5, 1864. Served in the 40th Kentucky Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant from July 5, 1864 to October 22, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, East Maysville, p. 119A-B.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 435.
